name: openevents
description: OpenEvents allows you to interact with events and members of a community.

scripts.build-windows: rmdir /Q /S dist\media && mkdir dist\media && xcopy /S /E .\src\media .\dist\media && npm run html-minifier && npm run css-minifier
scripts.build-mac: rm -r dist/media && cp -r ./src/media ./dist/media && npm run html-minifier && npm run css-minifier
scripts.html-minifier: html-minifier --input-dir src --output-dir dist --file-ext html --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace --minify-js true --minify-css true
scripts.css-minifier: html-minifier --input-dir src --output-dir dist --file-ext css --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace --minify-js true --minify-css true
